event.title: Power BI Online Training Demo - Intellipaat
event.description:
Intellipaat is organizing a free demo for Power online BI Training. The demo is for the Power BI Training. We provide the best online training classes to help you learn Power BI architecture, Desktop, Service, Mobile Apps, Visualizations, Reports, and deriving business insights. As part of this program, you will work on real-world projects.

What will you learn in this Power BI Training?
Get an in-depth understanding of Power BI and how it works in different scenarios
Three vital components: Desktop, Service and Mobile apps
Visualize and analyze data and derive insights from Excel spreadsheet or local database
Create compelling reports and visualizations, derive real-time insights and deploy it on demand
Create, share, collaborate and benefit from business information with purpose-built dashboards
Get the work done without being a Business Intelligence professional
Use Salesforce Data, Azure SQL Database and SQL server analysis tabular data
Deploy content packs to work with Quick Books online and Adobe analytics
Work on live projects on Power BI to get hands-on experience

Who can join the Power BI Training and Power BI Certification?

Individuals looking for jobs as Business Analysts, Business Development Manager, etc.
Statisticians aiming to implement their statistics skill to derive business insights
Marketing, Finance, Sales, and other domain Professionals who need extensive business intelligence

What should you know before joining this event?
Before joining the event, you should know the basics of PowerBI
Here a Few Free Resources
Power BI Tutorial
Power BI Interview Questions
Power BI Download
